sect2.title: Installation command explanations
sect2.para: Directories needed for Samba Web Administration tool.
Location of Samba smbpasswd and secrets.tdb file.
Location of Samba Web Administration Tool files.
Register the swat service to run on port 901.

para.userinput: echo "swat stream tcp nowait.400 root /usr/sbin/swat swat" >> /etc/inetd.conf :

sect2.para: Instruct inetd where to find and how to run swat.
